general.name: Map Network Drive [WIN]
general.description: Maps a Network Drive for the logged-on user. A user must be logged on.

variable.name: usrDriveLetter
variable.description: Letter to map the drive to. Do not include a colon or backslash. Use 'ANY' to automatically find a letter.

variable.name: usrDriveLocation
variable.description: UNC (Windows) path to map the drive to.

variable.name: usrOverwrite
variable.description: Overwrite preÃ«xisting mapped drive designations? (This may conflict with the 'ANY' letter setting)
